channel.title: [pi] Need help! server lagging!
channel.description:
Hi guys, i went on my vps and saw the cmd giving this error! [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/821/laggingserver.png/][IMG]http://img821.imageshack.us/img821/2500/laggingserver.png[/img][/URL]
i really need help because it makes the server lagging pretty hard!
thanks allready
chaske

item.title: [pi] Need help! server lagging!
item.dc:creator: @imgod1997 imgod1997
item.description:
@imgod1997 wrote:

email me or pm me on here its your client and tbh hybrid pvp v3 clients are shit i custom made a client that u mite be able to use it runs my server perfectly so i guess msg

item.title: [pi] Need help! server lagging!
item.dc:creator: @chaske1 chaske1
item.description:
@chaske1 wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:9, topic:398207”][quote author=X Entinity X link=topic=495342.msg3621587#msg3621587 date=1307471710]
Are you using MYSQL?
[/quote]Probably not. Someone might want to help him set it up cause I’m soon going to start learning SQL (don’t know much yet :S)[/quote]
I do not know what that is :s i know there is a bunch of files with SQL in my server files.

item.description:
@chaske1 wrote:

[/quote]
restart the server, ask them if anybody threatened to ddos or anything, and if it happens when you restart the server then tell me
[/quote]
Yes, it happens again when i restart, then 5 seconds not (or more or less). Then the error again

item.title: [pi] Need help! server lagging!
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“chaske1, post:3, topic:398207”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=495342.msg3621458#msg3621458 date=1307460916]
what’s giving this error? is somebody ddosing you? or maybe your vps isnt setup right, just guessing
[/quote]
i don’t know, i just got home from school and people say the server is lagging alot, they dc every 3-4 minutes. Idk what happened. And just to give more info to you guys.

This is an [pi] server [hybrid pvp] based. thanks[/quote]
restart the server, ask them if anybody threatened to ddos or anything, and if it happens when you restart the server then tell me
